p.This Certificate is a collaboration betw: This Certificate is a collaboration between Legal Studies and Forensic Science, which provides students with a working knowledge of criminal law, advocacy, and forensic science.  This certificate offers students interested in becoming lawyers and forensic expert witnesses with an understanding of both disciplines. The program requires 15 credit hours of undergraduate work.
